original_text: Michael and his angels threw the great dragon out of heaven. The dragon is called the Devil or Satan. He is the snake who has been there since long ago. He tells lies to deceive the whole world. They threw him down to the earth, together with all his angels.
korean_text: 큰 용이 내쫓기니 옛 뱀 곧 마귀라고도 하고 사탄이라고도 하며 온 천하를 꾀는 자라 그가 땅으로 내쫓기니 그의 사자들도 그와 함께 내쫓기니라

sentences.original_text: Michael and his angels threw the great dragon out of heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 미가엘과 그의 천사들이 큰 용을 하늘에서 쫓아냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: The dragon is called the Devil or Satan.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 용은 마귀 또는 사탄이라고 불립니다.

sentences.original_text: He is the snake who has been there since long ago.
He tells lies to deceive the whole world.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 온 세상을 속이기 위해 거짓말을 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They threw him down to the earth,
